# Introduction

*Suits* is an American legal drama television series created and written by Aaron Korsh. The series premiered on June 23, 2011, on USA Network and concluded on September 25, 2019.

# Viewership Trends Over Time

```{r}
# Plotting code for viewership trend
library(ggplot2)
viewership_data <- data.frame(
  Season = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9),
  Viewers = c(4.0, 4.2, 3.8, 3.6, 3.5, 2.9, 2.8, 2.5, 2.2)
)

ggplot(viewership_data, aes(x = Season, y = Viewers)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Viewership Trends of Suits Over Seasons", x = "Season", y = "Millions of Viewers")
```

# Analysis

The viewership of *Suits* shows a general decline from season 5 onwards. The decrease in viewership by `r viewership_data$Viewers[5] - viewership_data$Viewers[9]` million between seasons 5 and 9 highlights shifting viewer preferences or competing shows.
